Text: beautifully dl. seeding now. thanks man

ok it says "live gaming on windows failed to initialize. this may be because another live gaming on windows application (such as the halo 2 dedicated server) is running on the same machine. otherwise reinstalling the game may fix this problem." and it fails to load. patch isn't working for me. win 8 pro x64 running in vista sp2 compatibility mode.
You need to go to the Microsoft website and download the latest Windows Live.
Also you don't need to use compatibility mode, I'm on W8 x64 and it works fine for me without it.
